channel.title: Hi there, I'm Érica
channel.description: Recent content on Hi there, I'm Érica

item.title: About
item.description: Name: Érica Kamimura Nishimura E-mail: erica.k.nishimura Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/%C3%A9rica-k-nishimura-2b1ab535/ Github: https://github.com/EricaKN Description: “Seeker of Knowledge”. That is how I describe myself. Granddaughter of Japanese immigrants, I was born in Brazil, and since a very young age I have always been interested in learning new things. That is why I spent almost 2 years in Germany, exploring a new culture and learning a different approach to the studying process, the protection of the environment and social studies.
